WorkItem.Description:
Respected community members,
            I have tried installing TypeScript from TypeScriptLang.org website, 3- 4 times now, but every time I install it says install correctly, but when I open VS 2012 , it thorws an error and never opened. I had to reinstall vs 2012 one time.

can some one point out why TypeScript installation corrupt vs 2012????

Also there is no contact us or About us on TypeScriptLang.org for reporting this kind of issues.. or at least they should redirect to codeplex, isn't it??

Thanks,
Nick

Comments.Message:
Could you provide the exact error you are seeing? It is hard to debug what might have happened here with just the information provided. Did you have a previous version of TypeScript installed prior to 1.0?

On typescriptlang.org the interact button has links to this site and the forums.
Please re-open this issue if you're able to provide the requested information to help us debug how you hit this issue.
